metadata.notes: Full 11-organ semantic lexicon for entity-native emission. BOND/SANS/NDAM/RNX/EO/CARD atoms aligned with organ keyword implementations for trauma-aware, contextually-calibrated response generation. Nexuses form where 2+ organs activate the same atom above threshold, weighted by 11x11 Hebbian R-matrix coupling.
metadata.expansion_note: Added 171 friendly companion atoms across all 11 organs to enable warm, witty, tender voice emergence. Includes greetings, playfulness, self-awareness, Earthbound/Undertale style, and ordinary moment vocabulary.
